Ltd.","details":"VERSION: 2.0         DATE:    2020-12-15","methods":{"allowance(address,address)":{"details":"See {IERC20-allowance}."},"approve(address,uint256)":{"details":"See {IERC20-approve}.     * Requirements:     * - `spender` cannot be the zero address."},"automateInterestCollectionFlag(bool)":{"details":"Enable or disable the automation of fee collection during deposit process "},"balanceOf(address)":{"details":"See {IERC20-balanceOf}."},"balanceOfUnderlying(address)":{"details":"Returns the underlying balance of a given user","params":{"_user":"Address of the user to check"},"return":"balance  Units of underlying owned by the user"},"creditsToUnderlying(uint256)":{"details":"Converts a given credit amount into underlying","params":{"_credits":"Units of credits"},"return":"amount   Corresponding underlying amount"},"decimals()":{"details":"Returns the number of decimals used to get its user representation. For example, if `decimals` equals `2`, a balance of `505` tokens should be displayed to a user as `5,05` (`505 / 10 ** 2`).     * Tokens usually opt for a value of 18, imitating the relationship between Ether and Wei.     * NOTE: This information is only used for _display_ purposes: it in no way affects any of the arithmetic of the contract, including {IERC20-balanceOf} and {IERC20-transfer}."},"decreaseAllowance(address,uint256)":{"details":"Atomically decreases the allowance granted to `spender` by the caller.     * This is an alternative to {approve} that can be used as a mitigation for problems described in {IERC20-approve}.     * Emits an {Approval} event indicating the updated allowance.     * Requirements:     * - `spender` cannot be the zero address. - `spender` must have allowance for the caller of at least `subtractedValue`."},"depositInterest(uint256)":{"details":"Deposit interest (add to savings) and update exchange rate of contract.     Exchange rate is calculated as the ratio between new savings q and credits:                   exchange rate = savings / credits","params":{"_amount":"Units of underlying to add to the savings vault"}},"depositSavings(uint256)":{"details":"Deposit the senders savings to the vault, and credit them internally with \"credits\".     Credit amount is calculated as a ratio of deposit amount and exchange rate:                   credits = underlying / exchangeRate     We will first update the internal exchange rate by collecting any interest generated on the underlying.","params":{"_underlying":"Units of underlying to deposit into savings vault"},"return":"creditsIssued   Units of credits (imUSD) issued"},"depositSavings(uint256,address)":{"details":"Deposit the senders savings to the vault, and credit them internally with \"credits\".     Credit amount is calculated as a ratio of deposit amount and exchange rate:                   credits = underlying / exchangeRate     We will first update the internal exchange rate by collecting any interest generated on the underlying.","params":{"_beneficiary":"Immediately transfer the imUSD token to this beneficiary address","_underlying":"Units of underlying to deposit into savings vault"},"return":"creditsIssued   Units of credits (imUSD) issued"},"emergencyWithdraw(uint256)":{"details":"Governance action to perform an emergency withdraw of the assets in the connector, should it be the case that some or all of the liquidity is trapped in. This causes the total collateral in the system to go down, causing a hard refresh."},"increaseAllowance(address,uint256)":{"details":"Atomically increases the allowance granted to `spender` by the caller.     * This is an alternative to {approve} that can be used as a mitigation for problems described in {IERC20-approve}.     * Emits an {Approval} event indicating the updated allowance.     * Requirements:     * - `spender` cannot be the zero address."},"name()":{"details":"Returns the name of the token."},"poke()":{"details":"External poke function allows for the redistribution of collateral between here and the current connector, setting the ratio back to the defined optimal."},"preDeposit(uint256,address)":{"details":"During a migration period, allow savers to deposit underlying here before the interest has been redirected","params":{"_beneficiary":"Immediately transfer the imUSD token to this beneficiary address","_underlying":"Units of underlying to deposit into savings vault"},"return":"creditsIssued   Units of credits (imUSD) issued"},"redeemCredits(uint256)":{"details":"Redeem specific number of the senders \"credits\" in exchange for underlying.     Payout amount is calculated as a ratio of credits and exchange rate:                   payout = credits * exchangeRate","params":{"_credits":"Amount of credits to redeem"},"return":"mixReturned  Units of underlying mIx paid out"},"redeemUnderlying(uint256)":{"details":"Redeem credits into a specific amount of underlying.     Credits needed to burn is calculated using:                   credits = underlying / exchangeRate","params":{"_underlying":"Amount of underlying to redeem"},"return":"creditsBurned  Units of credits burned from sender"},"setConnector(address)":{"details":"Governance action to set the address of a new connector, and move funds (if any) across.","params":{"_newConnector":"Address of the new connector"}},"setFraction(uint256)":{"details":"Governance action to set the percentage of assets that should be held in the connector.","params":{"_fraction":"Percentage of assets that should be held there (where 20% == 2e17)"}},"setPoker(address)":{"details":"Governance action to set the address of a new poker","params":{"_newPoker":"Address of the new poker"}},"symbol()":{"details":"Returns the symbol of the token, usually a shorter version of the name."},"totalSupply()":{"details":"See {IERC20-totalSupply}."},"transfer(address,uint256)":{"details":"See {IERC20-transfer}.     * Requirements:     * - `recipient` cannot be the zero address. - the caller must have a balance of at least `amount`."},"transferFrom(address,address,uint256)":{"details":"See {IERC20-transferFrom}.     * Emits an {Approval} event indicating the updated allowance. This is not required by the EIP. See the note at the beginning of {ERC20};     * Requirements: - `sender` and `recipient` cannot be the zero address. - `sender` must have a balance of at least `amount`. - the caller must have allowance for `sender`'s tokens of at least `amount`."},"underlyingToCredits(uint256)":{"details":"Converts a given underlying amount into credits","params":{"_underlying":"Units of underlying"},"return":"credits     Credit units (a.k.a imUSD)"}},"title":"SavingsContract"},"userdoc":{"methods":{"redeem(uint256)":{"notice":"************************************* REDEEM***************************************"}},"notice":"Savings contract uses the ever increasing \"exchangeRate\" to increase         the value of the Savers \"credits\" (ERC20) relative to the amount of additional         underlying collateral that has been deposited into this contract (\"interest\")"}},"settings":{"compilationTarget":{"/Volumes/sdxc/ETHEREUM/CODE/mStable-v1-edit/contracts/savings/SavingsContract.sol":"SavingsContract"},"evmVersion":"istanbul","libraries":{},"optimizer":{"enabled":true,"runs":200},"remappings":[]},"sources":{"/Volumes/sdxc/ETHEREUM/CODE/mStable-v1-edit/contracts/interfaces/INexus.sol":{"keccak256":"0x8ac00cbb7588f1aea0b7a8a0ac0b1d8b12ae097e3fc0ec03aa6a5e45c4a2d9fd","urls":["bzz-raw://490602c4d449667e7b37ace56c7132e0665779a889e60857e21a30f5dfb70c50","dweb:/ipfs/QmV9RuY3FQ9WrpdkHVuHi46xBCq1WHp5suygQxJJY6nUcq"]},"/Volumes/sdxc/ETHEREUM/CODE/mStable-v1-edit/contracts/interfaces/ISavingsContract.sol":{"keccak256":"0xe407b18abcfc88493f9aa83f823a2311040710365fcf898b3421e5369d0bb9ee","urls":["bzz-raw://82914701efc92716269a67496179d86a80d019512e3292e6d4ffbb76a4a0fbbe","dweb:/ipfs/QmSvhJWr1LumFTdqWV7zpTD4K8ETM7HPJSvmiKtrNJzY3Y"]},"/Volumes/sdxc/ETHEREUM/CODE/mStable-v1-edit/contracts/interfaces/ISavingsManager.sol":{"keccak256":"0xad8136142690266e699adef0327fd06573c8b748ea5c6270d91b2252ecf5741e","urls":["bzz-raw://e6a9aac286acb485aacb2a52ab206c78c51652531b430d5cc6eeb913ae58a35a","dweb:/ipfs/QmWNjkifGQChBXRqruyodqoEV2RTzHVQkSC31wh52YEVyZ"]},"/Volumes/sdxc/ETHEREUM/CODE/mStable-v1-edit/contracts/savings/SavingsContract.sol":{"keccak256":"0xf0c0b482193479246510c8deff430ddd3adc993d1ff1e1b12817a0eaef49e96c","urls":["bzz-raw://3efcabc7efd1388be03fe60ee24a3931ccd9a3b92a8c056e8034ffe3ec969ea7","dweb:/ipfs/QmXHYFduzK7ayK7Gjd7RASh3o1A7RziY9XkGQZhXSfDThw"]},"/Volumes/sdxc/ETHEREUM/CODE/mStable-v1-edit/contracts/savings/peripheral/IConnector.sol":{"keccak256":"0xde2bb2acba3e7b958ec4375c4092ae62130de78fa2174cae5c89bd41b088958d","urls":["bzz-raw://fb60dfb13c80afddcd2127a70149df8b61c4dc5a6154b0cd1c13809d2c120a69","dweb:/ipfs/QmaaEWehNJB7ANkF2f9A1R1HbABNw1M9XYwLZVqudUkhcH"]},"/Volumes/sdxc/ETHEREUM/CODE/mStable-v1-edit/contracts/shared/InitializableERC20Detailed.sol":{"keccak256":"0x51854d4148a44ce74a36a37533e773375943ca3d904da1f44f48a38ac nodes.name: SavingsContract

nodes.documentation: @dev Only the savings managaer (pulled from Nexus) can execute this
nodes.name: onlySavingsManager
balanceOfUnderlying
underlyingToCredits
creditsToUnderlying

nodes.documentation:
@dev Deposit interest (add to savings) and update exchange rate of contract.
     Exchange rate is calculated as the ratio between new savings q and credits:
                   exchange rate = savings / credits
     * @param _amount   Units of underlying to add to the savings vault
nodes.name: depositInterest

nodes.documentation: @dev Enable or disable the automation of fee collection during deposit process
nodes.name: automateInterestCollectionFlag

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "Can only use this method before streaming begins"

arguments.value: Can only use this method before streaming begins

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "Can only use this method before streaming begins"

depositSavings
depositSavings

nodes.documentation: @dev Internally deposit the _underlying from the sender and credit the beneficiary with new imUSD
nodes.name: _deposit
redeemCredits
redeemUnderlying

typeDescriptions.typeString: function (struct SavingsContract.CachedData memory,uint256) pure returns (struct SavingsContract.ConnectorStatus memory)

nodes.documentation: @dev Internally burn the credits and send the underlying to msg.sender
nodes.name: _redeem
_getConnectorStatus

nodes.documentation: @dev Modifier allowing only the designated poker to execute the fn
nodes.name: onlyPoker

nodes.documentation:
@dev External poke function allows for the redistribution of collateral between here and the
current connector, setting the ratio back to the defined optimal.
nodes.name: poke

nodes.documentation:

@param _newPoker     Address of the new poker

@param _newConnector     Address of the new connector
nodes.name: setConnector
emergencyWithdraw

nodes.documentation: @dev Internal poke function to keep the balance between connector and raw balance healthy
nodes.name: _poke
_refreshExchangeRate

nodes.documentation:
@dev Converts mix amount into credits based on exchange rate
              c = (mix / exchangeRate) + 1
nodes.name: _underlyingToCredits

nodes.documentation:
@dev Works out a new exchange rate, given an amount of collateral and total credits
              e = underlying / (credits-1)

approve(address,uint256).details: See {IERC20-approve}.     * Requirements:     * - `spender` cannot be the zero address.

automateInterestCollectionFlag(bool).details: Enable or disable the automation of fee collection during deposit process

balanceOfUnderlying(address).details: Returns the underlying balance of a given user

params._user: Address of the user to check

balanceOfUnderlying(address).return: balance  Units of underlying owned by the user

creditsToUnderlying(uint256).details: Converts a given credit amount into underlying

decimals().details: Returns the number of decimals used to get its user representation. For example, if `decimals` equals `2`, a balance of `505` tokens should be displayed to a user as `5,05` (`505 / 10 ** 2`).     * Tokens usually opt for a value of 18, imitating the relationship between Ether and Wei.     * NOTE: This information is only used for _display_ purposes: it in no way affects any of the arithmetic of the contract, including {IERC20-balanceOf} and {IERC20-transfer}.

decreaseAllowance(address,uint256).details: Atomically decreases the allowance granted to `spender` by the caller.     * This is an alternative to {approve} that can be used as a mitigation for problems described in {IERC20-approve}.     * Emits an {Approval} event indicating the updated allowance.     * Requirements:     * - `spender` cannot be the zero address. - `spender` must have allowance for the caller of at least `subtractedValue`.

depositInterest(uint256).details: Deposit interest (add to savings) and update exchange rate of contract.     Exchange rate is calculated as the ratio between new savings q and credits:                   exchange rate = savings / credits

params._amount: Units of underlying to add to the savings vault

depositSavings(uint256).details: Deposit the senders savings to the vault, and credit them internally with "credits".     Credit amount is calculated as a ratio of deposit amount and exchange rate:                   credits = underlying / exchangeRate     We will first update the internal exchange rate by collecting any interest generated on the underlying.

params._underlying: Units of underlying to deposit into savings vault

depositSavings(uint256,address).details: Deposit the senders savings to the vault, and credit them internally with "credits".     Credit amount is calculated as a ratio of deposit amount and exchange rate:                   credits = underlying / exchangeRate     We will first update the internal exchange rate by collecting any interest generated on the underlying.

params._beneficiary: Immediately transfer the imUSD token to this beneficiary address
params._underlying: Units of underlying to deposit into savings vault

emergencyWithdraw(uint256).details: Governance action to perform an emergency withdraw of the assets in the connector, should it be the case that some or all of the liquidity is trapped in. This causes the total collateral in the system to go down, causing a hard refresh.

increaseAllowance(address,uint256).details: Atomically increases the allowance granted to `spender` by the caller.     * This is an alternative to {approve} that can be used as a mitigation for problems described in {IERC20-approve}.     * Emits an {Approval} event indicating the updated allowance.     * Requirements:     * - `spender` cannot be the zero address.

name().details: Returns the name of the token.

poke().details: External poke function allows for the redistribution of collateral between here and the current connector, setting the ratio back to the defined optimal.

preDeposit(uint256,address).details: During a migration period, allow savers to deposit underlying here before the interest has been redirected

params._beneficiary: Immediately transfer the imUSD token to this beneficiary address
params._underlying: Units of underlying to deposit into savings vault

redeemCredits(uint256).details: Redeem specific number of the senders "credits" in exchange for underlying.     Payout amount is calculated as a ratio of credits and exchange rate:                   payout = credits * exchangeRate
redeemCredits(uint256).return: mixReturned  Units of underlying mIx paid out

redeemUnderlying(uint256).details: Redeem credits into a specific amount of underlying.     Credits needed to burn is calculated using:                   credits = underlying / exchangeRate
redeemUnderlying(uint256).return: creditsBurned  Units of credits burned from sender

setConnector(address).details: Governance action to set the address of a new connector, and move funds (if any) across.

setFraction(uint256).details: Governance action to set the percentage of assets that should be held in the connector.

params._fraction: Percentage of assets that should be held there (where 20% == 2e17)

setPoker(address).details: Governance action to set the address of a new poker

symbol().details: Returns the symbol of the token, usually a shorter version of the name.

transfer(address,uint256).details: See {IERC20-transfer}.     * Requirements:     * - `recipient` cannot be the zero address. - the caller must have a balance of at least `amount`.

transferFrom(address,address,uint256).details: See {IERC20-transferFrom}.     * Emits an {Approval} event indicating the updated allowance. This is not required by the EIP. See the note at the beginning of {ERC20};     * Requirements: - `sender` and `recipient` cannot be the zero address. - `sender` must have a balance of at least `amount`. - the caller must have allowance for `sender`'s tokens of at least `amount`.

underlyingToCredits(uint256).details: Converts a given underlying amount into credits

userdoc.notice: Savings contract uses the ever increasing "exchangeRate" to increase         the value of the Savers "credits" (ERC20) relative to the amount of additional         underlying collateral that has been deposited into this contract ("interest")
